contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=April 2012}} {{Use Australian English|date=April 2012}} {{Infobox Australian place| type = town | name = Yuroke | city = Melbourne | state = vic | image = | caption = | alternative_location_map = Australia Victoria metropolitan Melbourne |longd=144.880|latd=37.600 | pushpin_label_position = left | lga = City of Hume | postcode = 3063 | pop = 380 (2011) <ref name="abs">{{Census 2011 AUS | id = SSC21544 | name = Yuroke (State Suburb) | accessdate = 2012-06-22 | quick = on}}</ref> | area = | est = | stategov = [[Electoral district of Yuroke|Yuroke]] | fedgov = [[Division of Calwell|Calwell]] | dist1 = 29 | location1= [[Melbourne]] | dist2 = | location2= | near-nw = | near-n = | near-ne = [[Mickleham, Victoria|Mickleham]] | near-w = [[Oaklands Junction, Victoria|Oaklands Junction]] | near-e = [[Craigieburn, Victoria|Craigieburn]] | near-sw = | near-s = [[Greenvale, Victoria|Greenvale]] | near-se = }} '''Yuroke''' is a bounded rural locality within [[Greater Melbourne]] in [[Victoria (Australia)|Victoria]], [[Australia]]. It is adjacent to the Melbourne Metropolitan Area beyond the Urban Growth Boundary.<ref>[http://www.dse.vic.gov.au/melbourne2030online/content/popups/fig_ip02_01.html Urban Growth Boundary map]</ref> It is 29 km north from Melbourne's [[Melbourne city centre|central business district]] and its [[Local Government Areas of Victoria|local government area]] is the [[City of Hume]]. At the [[Census in Australia#2011|2011 Census]], Yuroke had a population of 380. Yuroke is located between [[Mickleham, Victoria|Mickleham]] and [[Greenvale, Victoria|Greenvale]], on [[Mickleham Road]]. Yuroke Post Office opened around 1902 and closed in 1975.<ref name = "a">{{Citation | last = Premier Postal History | title = Post Office List | url = https://www.premierpostal.com/cgi-bin/wsProd.sh/Viewpocdwrapper.p?SortBy=VIC&country= | accessdate = 2008-04-11 }}</ref> Yuroke was the filming location for Melbourne band [[Painters and Dockers|Painters & Dockers]]' single ''Nude School''. ==See also== * [[Shire of Bulla]] - A former Local Government Area which Yuroke was a part of. * [[Electoral district of Yuroke]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{City of Hume suburbs}} {{melbourne-geo-stub}}
